```{r}

```

```{bash engine.path="/bin/bash"}
ls $RAW_FASTQS/[234]_TOT*L00[1234]*.fastq.gz
```

```{bash engine.path="/bin/bash"}
fastqc --quiet --threads $THREADS $RAW_FASTQS/[234]_TOT*L00[1234]*.fastq.gz --outdir $QC_RAW_DIR 
```

```{bash engine.path="/bin/bash"}
multiqc --force $QC_RAW_DIR --outdir ${QC_DIR} --filename multiqc_total_reads_raw.html
```
